title: I was excited for the new Guitar Hero game
body:
Then I saw the current confirmed artists 

- The Black Keys
- Blitz kids 
- Ed Sheeran 
- Fall out Boy 
- Gary Clark JR.
- Green Day
- The Killers 
- The Lumineers 
- My Chemical Romance 
- Pierce the Veil 
- The Rolling Stones
- Skrillix (Really? Seriously?)
- The War on Drugs 

GH3 was much better IMO
Then again my opinion may change when more artists are confirmed
